failed_invites_description: Je ne peux pas inviter ces gens, certainement à cause de leurs status ou car ce sont des bots.
fatal_error: Il y a eu un problème. Si ce problème persiste, vous pouvez demander de l’aide au support https://discord.gg/37kzrpr
retry_error: Il y a eu un problème. Veuillez réessayer.
invalid_command: "{0}" n’est pas définie comme commande. Essayez `{1}help`.
room_timeout_on: Ce salon disparaîtra après {} minutes d’inactivité.
room_timeout_off: Ce salon ne disparaîtra pas après inactivité.
lock_room: Le salon a été bloqué. Personne d’autre ne peut le rejoindre.
unlock_room: Le salon a été ouvert. D’autres personnes peuvent maintenant le rejoindre.
disband_from_inactivity: `{}` a été supprimé suite à inictivité.
disband_empty_room: Il n’y a plus de joueurs dans ce salon. Il a été supprimé.
already_in_room: Vous êtes déjà dans un salon.
already_is_host: You are already hosting a room.
in_multiple_rooms: You are in multiple rooms; please specify which.
no_category: Impossible de trouver la catégorie du salon.
not_in_room: Vous n’êtes pas dans un salon.
not_host: Vous n’êtes pas l’hôte du salon.
host_command_fail: Either you are not the host of a room or this command is disabled.
rate_limited: Timed out trying to edit a channel/role. Discord is probably rate limiting me, sorry!
missing_target_room: Veuillez spécifier le salon en question.
missing_target: Veuillez spécifier le joueur ou le @mentionner.
missing_target_invitees: Qui voulez-vous inviter ? (Vérifier si le nom est bien orthographié ?)
require_flags: Please specify the field(s) using flags.
self_target: Vous ne pouvez pas vous inviter vous-même.
need_integer: Cette valeur doit être un entier
voice_channel_exists: Il y a déjà un vocal pour ce salon.
size_too_small: Il y a trop de joueurs.
prefix_too_long: Le préfixe est trop long. Il doit contenir moins de {} caractères.
should_use_mentions: `{}` should be a list of ids/mentions.
purged_a: {} Les salons enregistrés dans la base de données ont étés supprimés.
purged_b: {0} broken channels and {1} broken roles have been deleted.
purged_b_fail: I missed {} channels and {} roles. Maybe grant me admin permission (temporarily!) and run the command so I can try again?
new_host: {1} est maintenant le nouvel hôte de {2}.
support: Rejoins le serveur : https://discord.gg/37kzrpr et pose tes questions !
coming_soon: Implementation in progress! For updates, check the support server (`{}support`)
settings_instructions: To set an option(s), use `{}settings -flag value`
invite_instructions: Réagis pour accepter ou refuser l’invitation.

_help: All about me!
Shows the amount of servers I am in and links to my source and creator.
Set the name of your room.
This is what the channel and role will be named as.
Set the color of your room.
Possible colors are: teal, green, blue, purple, magenta/pink, gold/yellow, orange, and red.
A random color is set if the specified color is not included above.
Set the description of your room.
The description is the little message that you will see in the room list.
Link to donation page for supporting RoomBot!
Edit room information using flags.
For example, `r.edit -activity myNewGame -size 4`.
You can use aliases (ex. `-a` for `-activity`).
Shows descriptions of all or specific commands.
...Like this. Pretty meta.
Change the host of your room.
Can either mention or use the name of new host.
Invite a player/players to your room (by name or mention).
Join a room (by activity or player).
Kick a player.
Can either mention or use the name of the kickee.
Leave a room. If you are the host, the room will be disbanded.
Shows your current room (or look at another room by activity or player).
List rooms in current guild.
Make a new room (uses current activity or input).
Pong! Shows latency.
Delete room(s) in this server.
Use flags (`-a` for all active rooms, `-b` for all broken rooms).
For moderation purposes.
Force delete a room (specify room name or @role).
For moderation purposes.
Set options for this server.
To set an option(s), use `-flag value`
Set the max player size of your room.
Once the room is full, I will ping the room.
Prevent people from joining your room.
Create a voice channel associated with this room.
Will not create if already exists.
Link to RoomBot's Discord support server
Bot prefix; RoomBot won't respond unless this prefix is the first thing in your message!
After inactivity for this amount of minutes, the room will automatically be disbanded.
Only these roles and administrators can use RoomBot. If there are no roles here, anyone can use RoomBot.
Users with this role and administrators will be able to view all active rooms. If there are no roles set, all bots will be able to access all rooms.
Whether or not to respond to a command with prefix that does not exist.
Whether or not to delete the command message that the user sends.
Default bitrate of voice channel
The name of the category where all the rooms are grouped.
Default names for rooms.
Default descriptions for rooms.
Default colors for rooms.
Default timeout for rooms.
Default size for rooms.
Whether or not to create a voice channel when making a new room.
Whether or not to lock the room when making a new room.
Messages used for when a user joins a room.
Messages used for when a user leaves a room.
Allow members to join multiple rooms.
Commands that the room host are allowed to use.
Language used for commands. Currently `en` is fully supported. Help add more languages by contacting the developer!

join_messages: The adventurer `{}` has joined your party.
leave_messages: Farewell `{}`... we will miss you, probably...
The adventurer `{}` has left your party.
invite_messages: You have been cordially invited to join `{1}`.
